text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The long race is about to begin…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
3600m, a steep road for me… 
I've run and run, but still it goes on.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
――I should be a role model for everyone, 
as class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
First up is the first 1200 meters. 
I'm going to overcome it!
